game.name: DeskAlchemy: Fairy Mine Tales
game.shortDescription: "DeskAlchemy: Fairy Mine Tales" is an idle to light storyline role-playing game. In a small town in this fantasy world, groundhogs and cultivators transcend dimensions and appear on your computer desktop during the gaps between their lives, work, and cultivation.
game.shortDescriptionEn: "DeskAlchemy: Fairy Mine Tales" is an idle to light storyline role-playing game. In a small town in this fantasy world, groundhogs and cultivators transcend dimensions and appear on your computer desktop during the gaps between their lives, work, and cultivation.
